= Getting started =

This page provides everything you'll need to know about getting started with AppUpdater4J

== Creating update file ==

http://appupdater4j.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/AppUpdater4J/site/zip-structure.png

An update file is a zip file which contains :
  * ANT libraries : usually ant.jar, ant-launcher.jar, ant-nodeps.jar
  * ANT's buildfile : this file contains all update installation instructions
  * Update property file
